org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl
Class LTLBDD

java.lang.Object
  jdd.bdd.NodeTable
      jdd.bdd.BDD
          org.svvrl.goal.core.util.EBDD
              org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.LTLBDD

public class LTLBDD
extends EBDD

This class provides a BDD manager for LTL formulae. In this BDD manager, there are two kinds of BDD variables, one corresponds to normal LTL formulae and the other corresponds to LTL formulae that are related to acceptance.

Author:
"Ming-Hsien Tsai"

syntacticallyImplies

public static boolean syntacticallyImplies(java.util.Collection<LTL> ante,
                                           LTL cons)
Returns true if a collection of LTL formulae (the antecedent, hold at the same time) syntactically implies a specified LTL formula (the consequent). In this method, all the LTL formulae will be expanded to basic formulae by the tableau rules. Note that the implication is syntactical, not semantic.

Parameters:
ante - the antecedent
cons - the consequent
Returns:
true if the antecedent syntactically implies the consequent

syntacticallyImplies

public static boolean syntacticallyImplies(java.util.Collection<LTL> ante,
                                           java.util.Collection<LTL> cons)
Returns true if a collection of LTL formulae (the antecedent, hold at the same time) syntactically implies another specified collection of LTL formula (the consequent). In this method, all the LTL formulae will be expanded to basic formulae by the tableau rules. Note that the implication is syntactical, not semantic.

Parameters:
ante - the antecedent
cons - the consequent
Returns:
true if the antecedent syntactically implies the consequent
